newsitem.title: GREECE: ATHLETICS-PROFILE OF WORLD MEN'S 200 METRES CHAMPION BOLDON.
newsitem.headline: ATHLETICS-PROFILE OF WORLD MEN'S 200 METRES CHAMPION BOLDON.

text.p: Profile of Ato Boldon, who won the world men's 200 metres title on Friday.
Born December 30, 1973. Port of Spain, Trinidad.

Took bronze in both the 100 and the 200 metres at last year's Olympics in Atlanta, clocking fastest ever third place times of 9.90 and 19.80. Finished a disappointing fifth in the 100 final here after setting the year's best time of 9.87 in the second round.
World junior champion for both 100 and 200 metres in 1992.
Mother is from Jamaica. Has lived in the U.S. since 1988. and is coached by American John Smith.
